NPCData.name: Captain Jeffers
NPCData.greetingTextStranger: Unless you're here to stop Silver Hook, I'm not interested.
NPCData.greetingTextAcquaintance: I remember you. You've assisted me before.
NPCData.greetingTextCasualFriend: I appreciate the help you've given me.
NPCData.greetingTextCloseFriend: Our work against the pirates is saving lives.
NPCData.greetingTextBestFriend: The two of us together will defeat this pirate menace!
NPCData.giftNotLikedText: Please don't bother me with this

Quest.title: There seem to be a lot of pirates around here.

Node.npcText: Pirate ships are attacking villages on the [east] coast. I need someone to scupper them, and fast!
Node.userText: I've taken care of those pirates for you.

Quest.title: Ho, Captain. How are things going with the pirates?

Node.npcText: Not well. They've set up a camp somewhere along the [Name coast]. If you can find it and clear it out, you'll be well rewarded.
Node.userText: I found the pirate camp. Safe to say, it's not there any more.
